DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to analyse and decode interviews of patient with breast cancer, and then established according a multidimensional profile specific to the population and to create a questionnaire tha will allow a practical and qualitative evaluation of the quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Breast Cancer and Quality of Life
DOC.criteria: age < 45 non metastatic breast cancer at least 6 months of relationship no life partner inclusion criteria failure
